pullRequest.body:
Use `normCast` to assist the discharger in `fieldSimp`.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

nodes.body: I just stumbled upon this PR. @mattrobball Can you comment on the status of this? (This certainly needs a rebase, and I gather some parts of it have become obsolete with #6312 - is this PR still desirable?)
I think there is still value. I also think a rewrite of `field_simp` will necessary anyway.

(Trying to rewrite field_simp is on my list of things to maybe try this summer. I'm happy to let anybody else have a go at it, if they prefer!)

Would you like help rebasing this PR/do you have a moment to do so yourself?
I just tried merging master (update: and make some basic tests).

### PR summary [5cd1d4a045](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/6034/commits/5cd1d4a045b0400e0b078d1da3c451d3f847a5b7)

<details><summary>

#### Import changes for modified files

</summary>

Dependency changes

| File | Base Count | Head Count | Change |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Mathlib.Tactic.FieldSimp | 433 | 434 | +1 (+0.23%) |
| Mathlib.Analysis.Analytic.Composition | 1312 | 1313 | +1 (+0.08%) |
| Mathlib.RingTheory.RootsOfUnity.Complex | 1401 | 1402 | +1 (+0.07%) |
| Mathlib.NumberTheory.Modular | 1463 | 1464 | +1 (+0.07%) |
| Mathlib.Analysis.Fourier.AddCircle | 1824 | 1825 | +1 (+0.05%) |


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
There are 2132 files with changed transitive imports: this is too many to display!

</details>

</details>

---

#### Declarations diff

No declarations were harmed in the making of this PR! üêô
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.
@mattrobball Does this PR need further work from your side, before you'd consider it ready for review?

So, CI fails in interesting ways: as far as I can tell, all errors are related to these three
- the `field_simp` in Analytic/Composition, line 470 now leaves some unsolved goals
- the `field_simp` in EllipticCurve/Affine, line 494 now times out
- there is another timeout in SobolevInequality, line 532

I'm out of my depth regarding these. @mattrobball if you would like to tend to this PR, investigating these (or, perhaps, if I merged your PR correctly), would be most welcome.

pullRequest.title: feat (Mathlib.Tactic.FieldSimp) : discharger uses normCast

source.title: [Merged by Bors] - field_simp: Use positivity as a discharger
